txt.en: Assault on Dhúrstrok -- Solo
'This must be the locked gate Shúkurz was talking about.'
'Lord Náin!'
'He's barely moving....'

'His beard... it's gone.... The Black Mattock is gone too. I'd wager it's been stolen, or worse, destroyed.

'We can't linger here to exact revenge upon Gorgar; we must return to Aslíf. Lord Náin's injuries do not seem grave, but he has lost much.

'Quickly now.'
'Gundabad... is... ours...'
'Look! Over there -- it's him!'
'One key found. One more to go.'
Find Náin
You have found Dhúrstrok, Gorgar's stronghold.\n\nYou should pick up the summoning horn to call Múta to your side.

Náin is trapped behind a locked gate.

Gorgar's generals, Gâdh-and-Shum and Mozrúk the Wind-rider, hold the keys.

<rgb=#FF0000>If you need assistance, use the Call Múta skill to call Múta to your side. If you lose access to this skill, pick up the summoning horn at the instance entrance.</rgb>
'Clear the path forward. Lord Náin has to be somewhere here.'
Talk to Múta
Use the summoning horn to call Múta
Talk to Múta
'Shaikmuz? Where are you going?!'
TBD
Defeated Gâdh-and-Shum
'AAAGH!'
'With luck, we'll live to see what we can create from these ruins.'
'You'll pay for that!'
Defeated Mozrúk the Wind-rider
'Get up, Shaikmuz! We've got a score to settle!'

You have obtained the keys needed to free Náin.

You should return to the gate to unlock and open it.

<rgb=#FF0000>If you need assistance, use the Call Múta skill to call Múta to your side. If you lose access to this skill, pick up the summoning horn at the instance entrance.</rgb>

'His beard... it's gone... The Black Mattock is gone too. I'd wager it's been stolen, or worse, destroyed.

'We can't linger here to exact revenge upon Gorgar; we must return to Aslíf. Lord Náin's injuries do not seem grave, but he has lost much.

'Quickly, now.'

You have unlocked and opened the gate to Náin's prison.

You should approach him to make sure he has not suffered grave injuries.

<rgb=#FF0000>If you need assistance, use the Call Múta skill to call Múta to your side. If you lose access to this skill, pick up the summoning horn at the instance entrance.</rgb>

High among the catwalks of Deepscrave lies Dhúrstrok, the stronghold of Gorgar the Ruthless. Somewhere within these aging halls filled with dwarf-relics, Gorgar's loyal generals have imprisoned Lord Náin. It is up to you to free him.
'Have you got both keys? Let's hurry.'
'Would you look at that, Shaikmuz? A stay of execution for that old dwarf!'
'This place is... incredible. What was it like before Gundabad was lost?'
Open the gate
'Don't worry, you'll all be joining him soon enough!'
Pick up the summoning horn
Approach Náin
'Let's hunt down the generals and take their keys -- with haste!'

Múta has something to say.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If you need assistance, use the Call Múta skill to call Múta to your side. If you lose access to this skill, pick up the summoning horn at the instance entrance.</rgb>
Defeat Gâdh-and-Shum
Defeat Mozrúk the Wind-rider
''I'll keep an eye on Lord Náin. Hunt down Gorgar's generals and take their keys -- with haste!''
'That's both of the keys! Let's hurry back.'

You should find Náin's location.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If you need assistance, use the Call Múta skill to call Múta to your side. If you lose access to this skill, pick up the summoning horn at the instance entrance.</rgb>
